line.comment: * Tugs will capture ships even if they cannot dock inside.
* AI tugs don't go in Unknown sectors.
* Gives the AI a lazyness factor, juste to give the player a little advantage.
* Abort if the ship receives another command.
* We have checked every ship in the sector, we should go home and unload tugged ships before checking other sectors.
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox': text=$t icon=29 timeout=0 fadeout=0

sval.val: Tugs will capture ships even if they cannot dock inside.
AI tugs don't go in Unknown sectors.
Gives the AI a lazyness factor, juste to give the player a little advantage.
Abort if the ship receives another command.
We have checked every ship in the sector, we should go home and unload tugged ships before checking other sectors.
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox': text=$t icon=29 timeout=0 fadeout=0
